title: Login button does not respond
description: When the user clicks the Login button on the homepage, nothing happens. No error message is shown, and the browser console shows a “Fetch failed” message. This started happening after adding the authentication module.

title: Attachment upload fails for large files
description: Uploading images larger than 5 MB results in “Upload failed” in the UI. The server logs show “FileTooLargeException”. Expected behavior: large files should be compressed or restricted with a proper warning

title: Unable to delete bug after refreshing
description: A bug can be deleted immediately after creation, but if the user refreshes the page and tries again, the delete API returns 404. Possible cause: wrong ID mapping or stale data after reload.

title: Search results not updating correctly
description: Typing into the search bar filters the bug list, but clearing the search input does not restore the full list unless the user presses Refresh. Expected: results should update live both ways.

title: Login button does not respond
description: When the user clicks the Login button on the homepage, nothing happens. No error message is shown, and the browser console shows a “Fetch failed” message. This started happening after adding the authentication module.
